Container.Name: TheFront
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install The Front and run it.
Initial server configuration: **Servername:** The Front Docker **Password:** Docker
**ATTENTION:** First startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files and it also installs the runtimes which can take quite some time!
Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version of the game is available.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please

Config.Name: GAME_ID
Config.Description: The GAME_ID that the container downloads at startup. If you want to install a static or beta version of the game change the value to: '2334200 -beta YOURBRANCH' (without quotes, replace YOURBRANCH with the branch or version you want to install).

Config.Name: UDP Ports
Config.Description: UDP PortsFirstPort: Game PortSecondPort: Beacon PortThirdPort: Query Port(If you need other ports delete this entry and create new UDP port mappings here in the template with the Container and Host port set to the same as in your EXTRA_GAME_PARAMS variable).

Config.Name: Game Parameters
Config.Description: Change if needed (has to end with a '?')

Config.Name: Extra Game Parameters
Config.Description: Change if needed (specify your extra game parameters here like: Servername, Password, Ports,...).

Config.Name: Public IP
Config.Description: Set your public IP here (if set to 'auto' the container will try to obtain the public IP automatically)

Config.Name: Validate Installation
Config.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Config.Name: Steam-Username
Config.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard - Don't use this field unless it's marked as required!).

Config.Name: Steam-Password
Config.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard - Don't use this field unless it's marked as required!).
